name: DOCUMENT_SIG_DATA
description: Contains data about the signatures collected for an electronic signature document.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SIG_IMAGE_FILE
columns.description: Stores the key of a signature image file for a e-signature document.

columns.name: SIGNATURE_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name of the signature from the signature template record for the signature collected in this field.

columns.name: SIG_TIMESTAMP_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time that this signature was collected.

columns.name: AUTH_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Hyperspace user who has signed the corresponding document signature.

columns.name: AUTH_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: AUTH_MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient portal (MyChart) user who has signed the corresponding document signature.
